Is Naegeli-Franceschetti-Jadassohn syndrome/dermatopathia pigmentosa reticularis inherited ?,"This condition is inherited in an autosomal dominant pattern, which means one copy of the altered gene in each cell is sufficient to cause the disorder.",GHR,Naegeli-Franceschetti-Jadassohn syndrome/dermatopathia pigmentosa reticula
